page.title: 10Farming
page.content: Gauldry is in a rural area surrounded by farms.There are 5 farms.The farms are mainly concerned with growing barley.Barley is used for making whisky and feeding cattle.Some farms have oats.Oats are used for cereals. Wheat is used for flour for baking. Turnips are grown for cattle food. Carrots are sold to the shops,and oil_ seed rape is crushed for cooking _ oil.Potatoes are for seed and also sold to shops.Silage is made for feeding cattle.Hay is also grown for this purpose.Everywhere you look all you see is fields.This is very fertile land and the farmers maintain excellent farms. by Jennifer Hubbard. --------------------
